HTMLSelectElementSize.summary: The size property of the interface specifies the number of options, or rows, that should be visible at one time. It reflects the {{htmlelement("select")}} element's size attribute. If omitted, the value is 0.

blockquote.para: While by default a <select> displays a single row unless is true, in which case four rows are displayed, the default value for the size property is 0.
